articles.author: ALI SWENSON
articles.title: A conservative leading the pro-Trump Project 2025 suggests there will be a new American Revolution - The Associated Press
articles.description: The leader of a conservative think tank planning for a massive overhaul of the federal government says we are in the midst of “a second American Revolution” that will be bloodless “if the left allows it to be.” Heritage Foundation President Kevin Roberts made…
articles.content: NEW YORK (AP) The leader of a conservative think tank orchestrating plans for a massive overhaul of the federal government in the event of a Republican presidential win said that the country is in th… [+3875 chars]
